message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale today, priced at $10000. It's a great opportunity to acquire something truly valuable. This is my first sale, so you're in on the ground floor. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to be your first customer. However, as there is no data yet on the quality of your products, I'm going to pass for now. I'd like to see how the product performs for other buyers before making a decision.  Let me know how things go!
